Text: Maybe you dont get a lot of comments because your iPod videos are large as hell.

Sometimes you put up a very good selection of stuff, but i dont know how they do it there is a way to shrink the file size and still retain the quality. dont mean to be rude, but some people carry just an 8 GB size device.

I can make them smaller in size, but I only normally use them for my apple TV 1st Gen so size really doesn't matter for that. I will try to get them down to about 330mb mark and see what they come out like. 
Thanks for the comment
